headline: Lexington Partners Names Three New Partners
summary: Lexington Partners L.P. ("Lexington"), a leading global manager of secondary private equity and co-investment funds, today announced that it has promoted three investment professionals to Partner, effective January 1, 2026.

raw.headline: Lexington Partners Names Three New Partners
raw.summary: Lexington Partners L.P. ("Lexington"), a leading global manager of secondary private equity and co-investment funds, today announced that it has promoted three investment professionals to Partner, effective January 1, 2026.

headline: IVZ's December AUM Rises on Inflows Despite Weak Markets, Stock Down
summary: Invesco reports 0.7% increase in December AUM to $2.17T as $7.7B in long-term inflows and FX gains offset a $23B hit from weak markets.

raw.headline: IVZ's December AUM Rises on Inflows Despite Weak Markets, Stock Down
raw.summary: Invesco reports 0.7% increase in December AUM to $2.17T as $7.7B in long-term inflows and FX gains offset a $23B hit from weak markets.

headline: Franklin Resources: Risky Pivot To Alternatives And Tokenization
summary: Franklin Resources (BEN) rated Hold: ~10x P/E looks cheap, but alt-asset strategy and tokenization risks persist.
